content: {"name": "Dallas High Shoals Christian Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "serves Gaston County. \nNo ID is required for TEFAP food assistance. ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.dallaschristianministry.org/food-assistance-program", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "305 East Trade Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Dallas", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28034", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.3160595, "longitude": -81.17251449999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 922-1236", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients may visit twice a week"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
